DOC.criteria: Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria . To eligible participate , participant must : sign informed consent form ; age 18 55 ; diagnosis opioid dependence accord DSM IVTR criterion ; good general health determine complete physical examination laboratory test ; assign probation/parole period least six month ; ( except participant parole/probation , see note ) ; negative result urinary opioids must self report least 3 day opioid free . Participants may diagnosis alcohol dependence long severe alcohol dependence require medical supervision alcohol withdrawal . Participants follow characteristic exclude study participation : current severe alcohol dependence require medical supervision alcohol withdrawal ; current psychosis , dementia , mental retardation , history schizophrenia ; significant clinical abnormality hematology , chemistry , urinalysis ; significant clinical cardiovascular , neurological , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , metabolic , endocrine , gastrointestinal disorder ; female subject pregnant lactating , female subject childbearing potential use birth control ( oral contraceptive , barrier ( diaphragm condom ) plus spermicide , levonorgestriel implant ) ; subject take opioid antagonist within prior 6 month ; current diagnosis chronic pain disorder .
